ardor.name: Ardor
ardor.description: Mining a spawner outside of water grants you (level * 2)% speed for 4s. Mining a spawner underwater refreshes (level * 0.5) breath.

delve_infusions.name: Delve Infusions
delve_infusions.description: From the Depths and the Delves, offering special enchantments that can be specially added to your gear!

quake.name: Quake
quake.description: When your melee attack kills an enemy, all nearby enemies in a 3-block cube take (level * 5)% of the damage dealt. Your weapon's Fire/Ice/Thunder Aspect, Decay and/or Bleed also get applied.

inure.name: Inure
inure.description: Gain effective Armor to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when taking the same type of mob damage consecutively (Melee, Projectile, Blast, or Magic) within 60 seconds.

soothing.name: Soothing
soothing.description: Regenerate 0.04 health per level each second.

snowy.name: Snowy
snowy.description: While you have an item with this enchantment in your inventory, you are able to be hit by other players with a Snowball Launcher. Be careful!

consumables.name: Consumables
consumables.description: Enchantments that function on consumable items.

celerity.name: Celerity
celerity.description: Gain 2.5% Speed per level if there are no hostile mobs within an 18 block radius.

expedite.name: Expedite
expedite.description: Once per tick, damaging an enemy with an ability increases your movement speed by (level * 0.75)% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

fueled.name: Fueled
fueled.description: Gain 0.3% Damage Reduction per level for every enemy that is on fire (vanilla or Inferno), slowed, or stunned within 8 blocks, capped at 4 mobs.

aura.name: Aura
aura.description: Mobs in a 3 block radius from you are slowed by (level * 3)% for 0.5 seconds. This is refreshed as long as they are in range.

magicprotection.name: Magic Protection
magicprotection.description: Multiplies magic damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

colossal.name: Colossal
colossal.description: Items reinforced with Colossal don't take durability damage 50% of the time. Works with the Unbreaking enchant.

poise.name: Poise
poise.description: Gain effective Armor to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when above 90% Max Health. Half of the bonus is granted when above 70% Max Health.

weapons.name: Weapons
weapons.description: Enchantments that alter your attacks and increase the damage of them.

blastprotection.name: Blast Protection
blastprotection.description: Multiplies blast damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

orbital.name: Orbital
orbital.description: Gain 1.5% Damage Reduction per level against aerial mobs and knocks them downward.

abyssal.name: Abyssal
abyssal.description: While equipped, you deal an additional (level * 10)% damage if either you or the enemy you are damaging is in water.

natant.name: Natant
natant.description: You move (level * 4)% faster when in water.

execution.name: Execution
execution.description: After killing an enemy, you deal (level * 1.5)% extra damage for 4 seconds.

anemia.name: Curse of Anemia
anemia.description: Reduces amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

drilling.name: Drilling
drilling.description: Breaking a spawner destroys one extra Spawner Shield per level.

festive.name: Festive
festive.description: While equipped, gain an aura of festive particles that improve with every additional item.

featherfalling.name: Feather Falling
featherfalling.description: Multiplies fall damage taken by (0.96) ^ (3 * level).

respiration.name: Respiration
respiration.description: Extends your breathing time underwater by (level * 15) seconds.

waxoff.name: Wax Off
waxoff.description: Removes wax from mined copper as your master taught you.

vigor.name: Vigor
vigor.description: Gain (level * X)% melee damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

skyseeker.name: Skyseeker
skyseeker.description: While equipped, deal an additional (level * 10)% damage to enemies who are above you.

veil.name: Curse of the Veil
veil.description: When equipped, drain (level) health every 3 seconds. This damage cannot kill you, and only triggers if there is a hostile mob within 24 blocks, Boss mob within 80 blocks, or the player has dealt damage within the last 12 seconds.

debarking.name: Debarking
debarking.description: Strips the bark off the logs you chop down.

mending.name: Mending
mending.description: Items with Mending that are worn or held repair 2 durability per xp orb consumed, chosen at random among your items with Mending.

riptide.name: Riptide
riptide.description: A Trident with Riptide can only be thrown when in water. When this happens, you are launched with your Trident a distance based on your Riptide level.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against non-Undead, non-human-like mobs: Spiders, Cave Spiders, Creepers, Endermen, Blazes, Ghasts, Slimes, Magma Cubes, Silverfish, Bees, Shulkers, Wolves, Ravagers, Hoglins, and passive animal mobs.

hope.name: Hope
hope.description: If this item would be inflicted with more than 1 shatter level from a death, it takes 1 level less.

vanishing.name: Curse of Vanishing
vanishing.description: When held in inventory, an item with Curse of Vanishing shatters upon death. Curse of Vanishing II will cause the item to be completely deleted upon death.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: Upon attacking an enemy, you gain (level * 10)% speed for 3 seconds. This has half efficiency on projectile damage. Upon breaking a spawner with a pickaxe, you gain (level * 5)% speed for 6 seconds.

knockback.name: Knockback
knockback.description: Adds (level * 3) blocks to your knockback on melee strikes.

cosmetic.name: Cosmetic
cosmetic.description: Enchantments that grant a cosmetic effect to your items.

sweepingedge.name: Sweeping Edge
sweepingedge.description: On non-critical fully charged melee swings, deals (20% * level) of the triggering attack's damage in an AoE around the targeted mob. Mobs must be within 3 blocks of the player's head or feet to be hit.

regicide.name: Regicide
regicide.description: While equipped, deal an additional (level * 10)% damage to Elite and Boss enemies.

explosive.name: Explosive
explosive.description: Critical Arrows you shoot deals an additional (level * 10)% splash damage in a 2-block radius, which also applies any Fire/Ice/Thunder/Wind Aspect, Decay and/or Bleed enchants.

fireprotection.name: Fire Protection
fireprotection.description: Multiplies fire damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level). Reduces fire duration by 10% per level.

infinity.name: Infinity
infinity.description: Bows and crossbows do not consume vanilla arrows, potions never go empty, and food never runs out.

throwingknife.name: Throwing Knife
throwingknife.description: Right-click to instantly fire an arrow, applying all enchantments and attributes. Damages the item by 1 point of durability if it has Infinity, or consumes it if it does not.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: Critical attacks deal normal damage instead. Abilities that require critical attacks can still be activated with a critical attack.

unbreaking.name: Unbreaking
unbreaking.description: Makes gear break (level + 1)x slower. Works the same on tools, weapons, and armor.

unyielding.name: Unyielding
unyielding.description: Increases your Knockback Resistance by 6% per level.

ephemerality.name: Curse of Ephemerality
ephemerality.description: All good things must come to an end. Will vanish when you log out, transfer shards, drop it, or try to move them to another inventory.

sustenance.name: Sustenance
sustenance.description: Increases amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

irreparability.name: Curse of Irreparability
irreparability.description: Some items are too fragile to be repaired...

armor.name: Armor
armor.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Agility. Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Armor. If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

gills.name: Gills
gills.description: While equipped or held, gain Water Breathing.

thorns_damage.name: Thorns Damage
thorns_damage.description: Deal (level) damage to a mob when it damages you with melee or projectile damage.

retrieval.name: Retrieval
retrieval.description: Arrows have a (level * 10)% chance to not be consumed.

trivium.name: Trivium
trivium.description: When hitting 3 or more mobs with a magical ability, deal (level * 10)% more magic damage.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Ignited enemies take (level) ailment damage every second for the duration they are on fire. Subsequent reapplications of Inferno refresh its duration.

oversized.name: Oversized
oversized.description: Using this item sets all tridents, snowballs, and Throwing Knives on cooldown.

depthstrider.name: Depth Strider
depthstrider.description: Allows you to move faster by (level * 33)% when in water.

divineaura.name: Divine Aura
divineaura.description: While equipped, the player and mobs hit gain an aura of divine particles.

kineticloading.name: Kinetic Loading
kineticloading.description: On a successful critical melee attack, instantly reload a crossbow from your Quiver, reset the cooldown of a Trident, Snowball or Throwing Knife, or regain an Alchemist Potion.

intoxicatingwarmth.name: Intoxicating Warmth
intoxicatingwarmth.description: When consumed, gain 1 hunger and 1 saturation per second for 12s. Cooldown: 30s.

rustworthy.name: Rustworthy
rustworthy.description: Curses mined copper to gather rust depending on the level.

celestial.name: Celestial
celestial.description: Deal 1.5 * level % more damage to enemies at a higher elevation than you.

spell_power.name: Spell Power
spell_power.description: Increases the damage of spells (+20% Spell Power increases the damage of all spells by 20%, for example), and only works with Mage skills. Spell Power stacks with the Magic Damage attribute.

earthaspect.name: Earth Aspect
earthaspect.description: Upon dealing melee damage, grants (level * 5)% damage reduction for 3 seconds. The same effect with half of the damage reduction applies when dealing projectile damage. Also applies upon mining a spawner.

cloaked.name: Cloaked
cloaked.description: Gain effective Agility to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when there's 2 or less enemies within 5 blocks. Half the bonus is granted if there are 3 or less enemies. The full bonus is also applied for 6 seconds after slaying an Elite or Boss enemy.

gilded.name: Gilded
gilded.description: While equipped, you gain an aura of gold particles. While dropped, your item gains similar particles. Additional items increase your particles, capped at 10. A reward for winning the voting raffle.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: Reduces the cooldown of infinite consumables by 2% per level.

decay.name: Decay
decay.description: Applies a Decay effect that deals 2 damage every (40 / level) ticks for 4 seconds.

fireaspect.name: Fire Aspect
fireaspect.description: Ignites the target for (level * 4) seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage.

perspicacity.name: Perspicacity
perspicacity.description: Gain (level * X)% magic damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

shielding.name: Shielding
shielding.description: Gain effective Armor to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when taking damage from an enemy within 2.5 blocks. Taking damage that would stun a shield and activates Shielding reduces Shielding's effect to half for 5 seconds.

vengeful.name: Vengeful
vengeful.description: Deal (level * 2)% additional damage to the last mob that damaged you.

temporalbender.name: Temporal Bender
temporalbender.description: When consumed, gain 4 hunger, 4 saturation, and +100% Ability Cooldown Recharge Rate for 5s. Cooldown: 30s.

arcane_thrust.name: Arcane Thrust
arcane_thrust.description: Your melee attacks damage all enemies 3 blocks in front of you, in a 0.6-block-wide line, dealt as melee damage.  Damage: 1 + base damage * level / (level + 1)

enlightening.name: Enlightening
enlightening.description: Uses the power of a Tesseract of Light (u) to place torches under falling blocks.

broomstick.name: Broomstick
broomstick.description: After being hurled using Riptide, apply slow falling until touching the ground.

lifedrain.name: Life Drain
lifedrain.description: Your critical melee attacks heal you. Normal melee attacks also heal you, but for less.  Healing (falling attack): √(level) Healing (non-falling attack): 0.5 * √(level) / √(attack speed) * attack cooldown

fortune.name: Fortune
fortune.description: Increases the number of resources gained when breaking ores and certain other blocks that drop resources, based on level.

understanding.name: Understanding
understanding.description: All non-Delve Infusions you are currently benefitting from gain (Understanding level * .2) levels.

guard.name: Guard
guard.description: Gain effective Armor to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP after blocking with a shield. Duration lasts for 4s if blocked from offhand, and 6s from mainhand. The bonus is also granted for 2s when taking 35% or greater HP at once.

grappling.name: Grappling
grappling.description: Your crossbow will act as a grappling hook, allowing you to pull yourself up to (level) blocks, with an emphasis on vertical distance. Shooting arrows consumes charges. Charges replenish every 5 seconds. Sneaking near a hook (including mid-air) will pick it up and replenish one of your charges early.  After shooting a block, left-click to pull yourself towards the block. Sneaking will prevent yourself from being pulled.  Also allows you to grapple yourself to mobs. Left-click while sneaking to pull mobs towards you.  Disables projectile-based abilities while held.

duelist.name: Duelist
duelist.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against human-like mobs: illagers, vexes, witches, piglins, piglin brutes, golems, giants, allays, and wardens.

blastfragility.name: Blast Fragility
blastfragility.description: Multiplies blast damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

fractal.name: Fractal
fractal.description: After hitting an enemy with magic damage, you will deal (10% * Level) increased magic damage to that enemy for 2 seconds. This increase can only happen once every 6 seconds.

stat_track.name: Stat Track
stat_track.description: Designates that an item has had stat tracking added to it via a Patron. Stats are only tracked if used by the person who added it as long as they're still a patron. A variety of different stats can be tracked, such as Mobs Killed, Times Consumed, Boss Damage Dealt, and more! Consider becoming a patron if you aren't one already to gain access to this perk.

galvanic.name: Galvanic
galvanic.description: Gain a 1.25% chance per level to stun a mob for 2 seconds (0.5 seconds for elites) when dealing or taking non-ability melee or projectile damage.

quench.name: Quench
quench.description: Increase duration of consumable's effects by 2.5% per level.

instability.name: Curse of Instability
instability.description: Randomizes the damage type of damage received when you get hit between Melee, Projectile, Magic, and Blast.

lure.name: Lure
lure.description: Decreases the time spent waiting for a fish to appear by (level * 5) seconds.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Gain effective Armor to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP. This bonus scales linearly with the amount of HP you are missing, up to 60%.

worldly_protection.name: Worldly Protection
worldly_protection.description: While held, grants 5% damage reduction per level in King's Valley areas, 7.5% damage reduction per level in Celsian Isles areas, and 10% damage reduction per level in Architect's Ring areas. However, damage dealt is reduced by 25% per level. Additionally, items with this enchantment are not affected by region restriction debuffs.

triage.name: Triage
triage.description: Increases the amount of healing you do to others by (level * 5)%.

two_handed.name: Two Handed
two_handed.description: Some items simply cannot be used correctly if your hands are full... Reduces attack damage, attack speed, and spell power of the item, reduces player movement speed, and restricts the ability to throw/shoot projectiles if held while also having an offhand equipped. Two-handed swords count as holding two swords for sake of Rogue abilities.

material.name: Material
material.description: A special item, used to craft another item - often Patron related ones. Items with this enchant also can be used as crafting materials in regular vanilla Minecraft recipes.

excavator.name: Excavator
excavator.description: Mine extra blocks in a 3 x 3 shape. Sneaking disables the effect.

soulspeed.name: Soul Speed
soulspeed.description: When on soul sand or soul soil, your speed will increase by (level * 10.5)%.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.description: After taking damage, any melee or projectile damage you deal within 5s is increased by (level * 2.5)%. Stacks up to 4 times, for (level * 10)% max damage, with duration refreshing each hit taken.

mitosis.name: Mitosis
mitosis.description: Mining a spawner debuffs all enemies in a 5 block radius with (level * 3.75)% Weaken for 3 seconds.

barking.name: Barking
barking.description: Magically regrows the bark onto the logs you chop up.

stasis.name: Stasis
stasis.description: While Stasis is active, you are immovable, immune to all damage and effects, and cannot use any interactions or abilities.

rageoftheketer.name: Rage of the Keter
rageoftheketer.description: When consumed, gain 4 hunger, 4 saturation, a +20% damage buff to melee, magic, and projectile damage, and +15% speed for 15s. Cooldown: 25s.

junglesnourishment.name: Jungle's Nourishment
junglesnourishment.description: When consumed, restore all hunger, gain 40% Instant Health, and gain 20% Resistance for 5s. Cooldown: 25s.

empowered.name: Empowered
empowered.description: When you gain XP, you have a 0.25% chance per XP point per level to repair all currently equipped items by 1% of their max durability. There is also a slight prioritization to more damaged items.

meleefragility.name: Melee Fragility
meleefragility.description: Multiplies melee damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: Reduces the duration shields are stunned for by 5% per level.

second_wind.name: Second Wind
second_wind.description: Damage from attacks applied to the lower half of your max health is multiplied by 0.9^(level). Attacks received while under this threshold get their damage reduced; attacks that bring you under this threshold have the portion of the damage that is applied past the threshold reduced.

choler.name: Choler
choler.description: Deal (level * 1)% additional damage to any mob that is on fire (vanilla or Inferno), slowed, or stunned.

waxon.name: Wax On
waxon.description: Applies wax to mined copper as your master taught you.

corruption.name: Curse of Corruption
corruption.description: Holding or equipping one item is fine, but too much corruption is bad for you...

meleeprotection.name: Melee Protection
meleeprotection.description: Multiplies melee damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

darksight.name: Darksight
darksight.description: Gives night vision when held or worn.

decapitation.name: Decapitation
decapitation.description: On a melee critical strike, deal (1.25 * level)% additional damage.

reflection.name: Reflection
reflection.description: 1 second after taking magic or blast damage, deal (level * 6)% of the damage to all mobs in a 4 block radius.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: Gain effective Agility to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when taking damage within 1.5 seconds of any previous damage from mobs.

ashesofeternity.name: Ashes of Eternity
ashesofeternity.description: Applies the effect of Resurrection upon death while holding in mainhand. When a player triggers this effect, the enchant is marked as "Used" and becomes unusable to them until the next new day. The enchant is refreshed and mark is removed when clicking with the item in mainhand, if a new day has occurred since last use.

multitool.name: Multitool
multitool.description: Allows a tool to change shape when you right-click with it. Level I lets it to cycle between a shovel and an axe, or a compass and shears, depending on the item. Level II additionally lets it cycle to being a pickaxe.

reverb.name: Reverb
reverb.description: On kill by melee strike or basic projectile attack, deal (10 * level)% of your overkill damage plus (5 * level)% of your highest damage source within the killing attack to an enemy within 8 blocks. Enemies killed by this damage can also trigger Reverb.

resurrection.name: Resurrection
resurrection.description: When you are about to die, this item provides 8 Absorption for 5 seconds, Regeneration 2 for 45 seconds, and Fire Resistance for 40 seconds, destroying itself in the process.

silktouch.name: Silk Touch
silktouch.description: Allows blocks to drop as themselves instead of their normal drop, when broken with an item with this enchantment.

sapper.name: Sapper
sapper.description: Restore (Enchantment Level) health by breaking a spawner.

magicfragility.name: Magic Fragility
magicfragility.description: Multiplies magic damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

efficiency.name: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Increases the speed at which you break blocks with the enchanted item. If on an Axe, it also increases the chance of stunning a shield by an additional 5% per level.

reflexes.name: Reflexes
reflexes.description: Gain effective Agility to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP for 0.65s after damaging any mob. DoT/indirect damage abilities cannot trigger this bonus. The bonus is granted at half effectivity for an additional 0.35s.

fervor.name: Fervor
fervor.description: Deal 1.5% additional damage per level for 3s after gaining a buff that lasts at least 5s.

piercing.name: Piercing
piercing.description: Lets arrows pass through up to the number of entities equal to the enchantment level.

retaliation.name: Retaliation
retaliation.description: After blocking damage, gain a damage bonus for 4s based on the type of enemy blocked (35%/50%/65% for normal/elite/boss, halved when dealing magic/projectile damage). Certain blocked debuffs will infuse the first basic melee/projectile attack in this period with an effect corresponding to the blocked debuffs.

usurper.name: Usurper
usurper.description: Heal (level * 2.5)% of your max health whenever you slay an elite or boss enemy.

technique.name: Technique
technique.description: When damaging a mob within 3 blocks, deal 10 * level % more magic, projectile, and melee ability (not physical) damage.

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Allows secondary enchants (ex: Shielding, Reflexes, etc.) to all work with the defense type (Armor or Agility) you have the most of.

ineptitude.name: Ineptitude
ineptitude.description: Increases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

starvation.name: Starvation
starvation.description: Depletes your saturation and current hunger points by (Enchantment level) upon consuming the item cursed with Starvation. It fully depletes saturation, then moves on to removing hunger points.

defenses.name: Defenses
defenses.description: Enchantments that reduce the damage you take in some way or another.

infusions.name: Infusions
infusions.description: Enchantments that can be specially added to your gear, should you pay the costs!

phylactery.name: Phylactery
phylactery.description: Dying with an item infused with Phylactery saves (10% * level) of your experience points in your grave. This stacks additively with itself across all items equipped. Experience will only be saved if you died with more than 100 experience points. Additionally, keep potion effects upon dying for (5% * level) of the duration.

epoch.name: Epoch
epoch.description: Class abilities cooldowns are reduced by (level * 1)%.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Armor. Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Agility. If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

iceaspect.name: Ice Aspect
iceaspect.description: Applies (level * 10)% Slowness for 4 seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Blazes.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against Undead mobs.

tempo.name: Tempo
tempo.description: Gain effective Agility to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when taking damage after 4 seconds of taking no damage from mobs. Half of the bonus is granted after 2.5 seconds of taking no damage from mobs.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.description: Crossbows enchanted with Multishot fire 3 projectiles at once in a spread pattern. Only one projectile is consumed and only one out of the 3 can be picked up off the ground.

multiload.name: Multi-Load
multiload.description: Upon reloading your crossbow, consume up to (level) extra arrows. For each arrow consumed, instantly reload crossbow after firing.

looting.name: Looting
looting.description: Increases common loot drops by (Enchantment level) chances.

owned.name: Owned
owned.description: Establishes ownership of an item for either a player or a guild. This infusion can only be removed by the specified owner of the item.

weightless.name: Weightless
weightless.description: May be held in the offhand without incurring a debuff from the Two Handed curse.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is further than 12 blocks.

shrapnel.name: Curse of Shrapnel
shrapnel.description: When used to break a spawner or firing a projectile, take (level) damage. When attacking a mob with a melee hit, take (level)/2 damage. This damages armor and bypasses damage reductions.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Gain (level * X)% projectile damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

pointblank.name: Point Blank
pointblank.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is within 8 blocks.

liquidcourage.name: Liquid Courage
liquidcourage.description: When consumed, gain 8 hunger, 8 saturation, and 20% Resistance against 3 incoming Melee, Projectile or Magic attacks for 15s. Cooldown: 30s.

hexeater.name: Hex Eater
hexeater.description: Adds (level * 0.5) extra damage per debuff on the target to basic melee, projectile or Alchemist Potion hits.

projectileprotection.name: Projectile Protection
projectileprotection.description: Multiplies projectile damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

pestilence.name: Curse of Pestilence
pestilence.description: When dealing direct (not ability) melee or projectile damage, you have a (10% * level) chance to receive a random debuff out of Poison 1, Hunger 2, 15% Vulnerability, -15% Speed, or -30% Healing. The debuff lasts for 6 seconds.

spiritshot.name: Spiritshot
spiritshot.description: Allows the weapon to be used in the Spirit Archery Minigame.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: When equipped, regain sqrt(level) / 12 health 4 times per second.

chaotic.name: Chaotic
chaotic.description: Your weapon deals anywhere between +Level and -Level damage, in integer increments, on basic melee, projectile and Alchemist Potion hits. This effect is halved for sweep attacks.

tools.name: Tools and Utility
tools.description: Enchantments that grant a helpful effect to your tools and weapons.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: Gain effective Agility to grant up to 20% / 25% / 30% bonus EHP when taking damage from a source further than 4 blocks from the player.

aquaaffinity.name: Aqua Affinity
aquaaffinity.description: Allows you to mine blocks underwater as if you were on land.

firefragility.name: Fire Fragility
firefragility.description: Multiplies fire damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

firststrike.name: First Strike
firststrike.description: The first melee hit, projectile damage or thrown Alchemist Potion against a mob deals 10 * level % more damage. Melee damage from enchantments or abilities will also be affected if it is applied simultaneously with a melee hit. The bonus damage can be reapplied to the same target every 3 seconds.

aptitude.name: Aptitude
aptitude.description: Decreases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

windaspect.name: Wind Aspect
windaspect.description: Launch mobs hit by (Level * 1.5) blocks and applies Slow Falling for 1 second.

curses.name: Curses
curses.description: Curses that cause negative effects. Be careful!

unrustworthy.name: Unrustworthy
unrustworthy.description: Removes all rust from mined copper.

intuition.name: Intuition
intuition.description: While equipped, grants 50% more experience, no matter the level.

instantdrink.name: Instant Drink
instantdrink.description: Right clicking a potion with this enchant will instantly apply its effects to the player using it.

radiant.name: Radiant
radiant.description: While held in your main hand, gain Glowing and Night Vision for 30s. You must be the soulbound owner of your item for this to work.

thunderaspect.name: Thunder Aspect
thunderaspect.description: Has a (level * 10)% chance to stun a mob for 2 seconds (0.5 for Elites) when dealing melee damage, or for 0.5 seconds (0 for Elites) when dealing projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Guardians and Iron Golems.

passiveeffects.name: Passives
passiveeffects.description: Enchantments that grant a passive effect when used or worn.

carapace.name: Carapace
carapace.description: After being hit by a mob, gain (level * 1.25)% damage reduction for 5 seconds, refreshed on being hit.

quick_charge.name: Quick Charge
quick_charge.description: Decreases the time it takes to load a crossbow by (level * 0.25) seconds.

locked.name: Locked
locked.description: Prevents the item from being swapped by a lockbox.

exorcism.name: Exorcism
exorcism.description: Deals 15 damage and applies Slowness III to mobs summoned within the Valley of Forgotten Pharaohs.

ranged.name: Ranged
ranged.description: Enchantments that grant special ranged effects.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Mining a spawner deals (level * 4) damage to mobs within 5 blocks and apply the effects of Fire, Ice, Thunder, and Wind Aspects as well as Decay to affected mobs. Thunder Aspect applied via Eruption always stuns mobs, for (level * 0.3) seconds. Additionally, apply effects of Sapper and Adrenaline to players within 8 blocks, if the pickaxe used to mine the spawner has the enchantment.

bleeding.name: Bleeding
bleeding.description: Applies (level) stacks of Bleed to enemies struck by the Bleeding weapon. Bleed stacks last 5s, applying (for normal enemies) 3% Weakness per stack. At 8 stacks, the mob Hemorrhages, losing all stacks and taking 25% max health as damage, capped at (region * 35) flat damage. Bosses instead receive 1% Weakness, stacking up to 20, and Hemorrhage for a flat (region * 100) damage. Hemorrhaged mobs are Weakened by 30% for 5s and cannot gain Bleed stacks during this time.

recoil.name: Recoil
recoil.description: When firing a projectile weapon, get knocked back a short distance, increasing with level. Crouching while firing prevents the recoil, but places the weapon on cooldown for 0.5 seconds.

revelation.name: Revelation
revelation.description: Items infused with Revelation increase the level of any Delve infusion on the item by one level.

projectilefragility.name: Projectile Fragility
projectilefragility.description: Multiplies projectile damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

crippling.name: Curse of Crippling
crippling.description: When under 50% health, your damage and movement speed is reduced by 10% per level.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: For the next 2s after you attack a mob, deal an additional (level * 10)% of your physical attack's damage to the mob when they hit a wall, or if they fall from more than 3 blocks. Hit enemies lose (level * 10)% Knockback Resistance.
